description: Systematic distortions observed in Council reasoning—heuristics about our own heuristics

detected_biases.name: Western-Tradition Overweighting
detected_biases.observation: Council shows systematic over-weighting of Western philosophical traditions in telos definitions
detected_biases.detection_method: Analysis of dropbox rejection reasons—Eastern virtue-ethics submissions scored lower relevance due to keyword mismatch
manifestation: Islamic ethics submissions routed to quarantine at higher rates
detected_biases.corrective_action: Expanded keyword corpus; added Confucian, Buddhist, and Islamic virtue concepts to relevance detector

detected_biases.name: Technical-Solutionism
detected_biases.observation: Council tends to propose technical fixes for social/political problems
detected_biases.detection_method: Analysis of guardrail proposals—78% involve technical implementation vs institutional change
manifestation: Preference for code-based enforcement over normative change
detected_biases.corrective_action: Require social/political alternative consideration for each technical proposal; weight non-technical submissions higher
